item: greater sturdy shield (Hardness 15, HP 120, BT 60) with +2 striking shield spikes
markdown:
**[Recall Knowledge - Humanoid](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)** ([Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14)): DC 42 **[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 40 **[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 37 [Huldrin Skolsdottir](/NPCs.aspx?ID=1507) **Source** [Pathfinder #167: Ready? Fight!](/Sources.aspx?ID=86) pg. 42 **Perception** +25 **Languages** [Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1), [Skald](/Languages.aspx?ID=42) **Skills** [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +27, [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7) +20, [Warfare Lore](/Skills.aspx?ID=8) +25 **Str** +5 **Dex** +2 **Con** +5 **Int** +3 **Wis** +3 **Cha** +0 **Items** _+2 [resilient](/Equipment.aspx?ID=279) [hide armor](/Armor.aspx?ID=7)_, _[greater sturdy shield](/Equipment.aspx?ID=327)_ (Hardness 15, HP 120, BT 60) with _+2 [striking](/Equipment.aspx?ID=280) [shield spikes](/Weapons.aspx?ID=42)_, _+2 [striking](/Equipment.aspx?ID=280) [flaming](/Equipment.aspx?ID=295) [trident](/Weapons.aspx?ID=45)_ --- **AC** 34 (36 with shield raised) **Fort** +26 **Ref** +25 **Will** +27 **HP** 280 **Resistances** [cold](/Traits.aspx?ID=27) 10 **[Attack of Opportunity](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=3)** Huldrin gets 1 extra reaction each turn that she can use only to make an Attack of Opportunity.
**[Shield Block](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=32)** This reaction also triggers when an ally adjacent to Huldrin takes damage from an attack or when Huldrin takes any damage (even non-physical damage) as a result of a Reflex save. It prevents damage to that ally or to Huldrin, respectively. --- **Speed** 20 feet **Melee** _trident_ +29 ([Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103)), **Damage** 2d8+13 piercing plus 1d6 fire **Melee** _shield spikes_ +29 ([Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103)), **Damage** 2d6+13 piercing plus [Improved Knockdown](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=28) **Ranged** _trident_ +26 ([Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103), [thrown 20 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=195)), **Damage** 2d8+13 piercing plus 1d6 fire **Iron Maiden Stance** ([Stance](/Traits.aspx?ID=152)) **Requirements** Huldrin is wielding a shield; **Effect** Huldrin gains the benefits of [Raise a Shield](/Actions.aspx?ID=98) until she no longer meets this stance's requirements. While in this stance, whenever an ally's Strike deals damage to an enemy within Huldrin's reach, that enemy takes 1d6 piercing damage.
name: Huldrin Skolsdottir

Shield Block Reaction This reaction also triggers when an ally adjacent to Huldrin takes damage from an attack or when Huldrin takes any damage (even non-physical damage) as a result of a Reflex save. It prevents damage to that ally or to Huldrin, respectively. --- Speed 20 feet Melee Single Action trident +29 (Magical), Damage 2d8+13 piercing plus 1d6 fire Melee Single Action shield spikes +29 (Magical), Damage 2d6+13 piercing plus Improved Knockdown Ranged Single Action trident +26 (Magical, thrown 20 feet), Damage 2d8+13 piercing plus 1d6 fire Iron Maiden Stance Single Action (Stance) Requirements Huldrin is wielding a shield; Effect Huldrin gains the benefits of Raise a Shield until she no longer meets this stance's requirements. While in this stance, whenever an ally's Strike deals damage to an enemy within Huldrin's reach, that enemy takes 1d6 piercing damage.
